Gold Dwarf Shield Dwarf Duergar

Dwarf is a Race in Baldur's Gate 3. Dwarfs feature both Handaxe and Hammer proficiency. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types of Races. Each of them has their own special characteristics.
